name: The Exorcist's Story
description:
The Exorcist's Story is an adventure game with RPG elements in an open world in which you will move around the city in which you will need to find your main enemy.Also, do not forget that you are a church worker and you will have to conduct sermons and even rituals to exorcise demons.If it is necessary, of course.After all, not everyone can be possessed by a demon.

You are in the role of a young priest Antonio, who previously had experience in the rites of exorcism, but one day everything went wrong and a girl died during the rite.The devil Asmodeus was stronger.Antonio avoided prison, but promised himself never to perform exorcisms again.A couple of years later.Antonio lives in a small town and works as a priest, but one day very strange things happen in the city.Has Asmodeus challenged you again?

You need to go on a dangerous adventure and meet a real fiend of hell.Will you be able to defeat the devil who captured the souls of ordinary people?
will he be able to take revenge on the terrible demon Asmodeus who ruined the lives of many people
But do not forget that Asmodeus is not the only demon with whom you will have to fight and save people from the slaves of hell.

features of the game:
1) unusual game setting
2) non-linear plot
3) your decisions affect the world
4) the opportunity to work as an exorcist
5) Many Easter eggs and movie references
